appendix.title: Command Index
appendix.para: This appendix was automatically built from Roo 1.0.0.RC2 [rev 321].

Commands are listed in alphabetic order, and are shown in monospaced font with any mandatory options you must specify when using the command. Most commands accept a large number of options, and all of the possible options for each command are presented in this appendix.

section.title: Backup Commands
section.para: Backup Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.backup.BackupCommands.

section.title: backup
section.para: Backup your project to a zip file
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: Bootstrap Commands
section.para: Bootstrap Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.bootstrap.BootstrapCommands.

section.title: development mode
section.para: Switches the system into development mode (greater diagnostic information)

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: poll now
section.para: Perform a manual file system poll
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: poll speed
section.para: Changes the file system polling speed

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: poll status
section.para: Display file system polling information
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: Bundlor Commands
section.para: Bundlor Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.bundlor.BundlorCommands.

section.title: bundlor add explicit import
section.para: Add an explicit import for a dependency Bundlor cannot detect

listitem.para: package to import
minimum version to accept
version range ceiling, use INF for infinity
should upper version be inclusive (default = exclusive)
treat package import as optional (default = mandatory)

section.title: bundlor configure imports
section.para: specify version range for package imports, and whether they are optional

listitem.para: package name with optional .* postfix
minimum version to accept
version range ceiling, use INF for infinity
should upper version be inclusive (default = exclusive)
treat package import as optional (default = mandatory)

section.title: bundlor non-exported packages
section.para: specify packages that should not be exported by the bundle

listitem.para: package name with optional .* postfix

section.title: bundlor setup
section.para: automatically create and manage an OSGi manifest for this project using Bundlor

listitem.para: Human readable name for the bundle

section.title: bundlor version package exports
section.para: specify version to export individual packages at (defaults to bundle version)

listitem.para: package name with optional .* postfix
version to export package at

section.title: Classpath Commands
section.para: Classpath Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.classpath.operations.ClasspathCommands.

section.title: class
section.para: Creates a new Java class source file in any project path

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
The superclass (defaults to java.lang.Object)
Whether the generated class should be marked as abstract
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: dod
section.para: Creates a new data on demand for the specified entity

listitem.para: No help available
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: entity
section.para: Creates a new JPA persistent entity in SRC_MAIN_JAVA

listitem.para: No help available
The superclass (defaults to java.lang.Object)
Whether the generated class should be marked as abstract
Create automatic integration tests for this entity
The JPA table name to use for this entity
The JPA identifier field name to use for this entity
The JPA identifier field column to use for this entity
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: enum constant
section.para: Inserts a new enum constant into an enum

listitem.para: The name of the enum class to receive this field
The name of the constant
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: enum type
section.para: Creates a new Java enum source file in any project path

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: interface
section.para: Creates a new Java interface source file in any project path

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: test integration
section.para: Creates a new integration test for the specified entity

listitem.para: No help available
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: Controller Commands
section.para: Controller Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.web.mvc.controller.ControllerCommands.

section.title: controller all
section.para: Scaffold a controller for all entities without an existing controller

listitem.para: The package in which new controllers will be placed

section.title: controller class
section.para: Create a new manual Controller (ie where you write the methods)

listitem.para: The path and name of the controller object to be created
Indicates a specific request mapping path for this controller (eg /foo/)

section.title: controller scaffold
section.para: Create a new scaffold Controller (ie where we maintain CRUD automatically)

listitem.para: The path and name of the controller object to be created
The name of the entity object which the controller exposes to the web tier
The base path under which the controller listens for RESTful requests (defaults to the simple name of the form backing object)
A comma separated list of operations (only create, update, delete allowed) that should not be generated in the controller
The date format defaults to the current locale, use this parameter to customize the date format

section.title: Field Commands
section.para: Field Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.classpath.operations.FieldCommands.

section.title: field boolean
section.para: Adds a private boolean field to an existing Java source file

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The name of the class to receive this field
Whether this value cannot be null
Whether this value must be null
Whether this value must assert false
Whether this value must assert true
The JPA column name
An optional comment for JavaDocs
Indicates to use a primitive type
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: field date
section.para: Adds a private date field to an existing Java source file

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The Java type of the entity
The type of persistent storage to be used
The name of the class to receive this field
Whether this value cannot be null
Whether this value must be null
Whether this value must be in the future
Whether this value must be in the past
The JPA column name
An optional comment for JavaDocs
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: field enum
section.para: Adds a private enum field to an existing Java source file

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The enum type of this field
The name of the class to receive this field
Whether this value cannot be null
Whether this value must be null
The fetch semantics at a JPA level
An optional comment for JavaDocs
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: field number
section.para: Adds a private numeric field to an existing Java source file

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The Java type of the entity
The name of the class to receive this field
Whether this value cannot be null
Whether this value must be null
The BigDecimal string-based representation of the minimum value
The BigDecimal string based representation of the maximum value
The minimum value
The maximum value
The JPA column name
An optional comment for JavaDocs
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates to use a primitive type if possible
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: field other
section.para: Inserts a private field into the specified file

listitem.para: The name of the class to receive this field
The path where the class can be found
The name of the field
The Java type of this field
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: field reference
section.para: Adds a private reference field to an existing Java source file (ie the 'many' side of a many-to-one)

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The Java type of the entity to reference
The name of the class to receive this field
Whether this value cannot be null
Whether this value must be null
The JPA Join Column name
The fetch semantics at a JPA level
An optional comment for JavaDocs
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: field set
section.para: Adds a private Set field to an existing Java source file (ie the 'one' side of a many-to-one)

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The entity which will be contained within the Set
The name of the class to receive this field
The field name on the referenced type which owns the relationship
Whether this value cannot be null
Whether this value must be null
The minimum string length
The maximum string length
The relationship cardinarily at a JPA level
The fetch semantics at a JPA level
An optional comment for JavaDocs
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: field string
section.para: Adds a private string field to an existing Java source file

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The name of the class to receive this field
Whether this value cannot be null
Whether this value must be null
The BigDecimal string-based representation of the minimum value
The BigDecimal string based representation of the maximum value
The minimum string length
The maximum string length
The required regular expression pattern
The JPA column name
An optional comment for JavaDocs
Indicates to mark the field as transient
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: Finder Commands
section.para: Finder Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.finder.FinderCommands.

section.title: finder add
section.para: Install finders in the given target (must be an entity)

listitem.para: The controller or entity for which the finders are generated
The finder string as generated with 'list finders for'

section.title: finder list
section.para: List all finders for a given target (must be an entity

listitem.para: The controller or entity for which the finders are generated
The depth of attribute combinations to be generated for the finders
A comma separated list of strings that must be present in a filter to be included

section.title: Hint Commands
section.para: Hint Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.classpath.operations.HintCommands.

section.title: hint
section.para: Provides step-by-step hints and context-sensitive guidance

listitem.para: The topic for which advice should be provided

section.title: Integration Test Commands
section.para: Integration Test Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.test.IntegrationTestCommands.

section.title: test mock
section.para: Creates a mock test for the specified entity

listitem.para: No help available
Indicates whether reserved words are ignored by Roo

section.title: J Line Shell
section.para: J Line Shell are contained in org.springframework.roo.shell.jline.JLineShell.
End of block comment
This command does not accept any options.
Start of block comment
This command does not accept any options.
Inline comment markers
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: date
section.para: Displays the local date and time
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: exit
section.para: Exits the shell
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: props
section.para: Shows the shell's properties
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: script
section.para: Parses the specified resource file and executes its commands

listitem.para: The file to locate and execute
No help available

section.title: version
section.para: Displays shell version

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: Jms Commands
section.para: Jms Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.jms.JmsCommands.

section.title: field jms template
section.para: insert a JmsTemplate field into an existing type

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The name of the class to receive this field

section.title: jms listener class
section.para: Create a new class which is a asynchronous JMS consumer

listitem.para: The name of the class to create
The name of the destination
The type of the destination

section.title: jms setup
section.para: Install a JMS provider in your project

listitem.para: The persistence provider to support
The name of the destination
The type of the destination

section.title: Jpa Commands
section.para: Jpa Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.jpa.JpaCommands.

section.title: database properties list
section.para: Shows database configuration details
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: database properties remove
section.para: Removes a particular database property

listitem.para: The property key that should be removed

section.title: database properties set
section.para: Changes a particular database property

listitem.para: The property key that should be changed
The new vale for this property key

section.title: persistence exception translation
section.para: Installs support for JPA exception translation

listitem.para: The package in which the JPA exception translation aspect will be installed

section.title: persistence setup
section.para: Install or updates a JPA persistence provider in your project

listitem.para: The persistence provider to support
The database to support
The JNDI datasource to use

section.title: Logging Commands
section.para: Logging Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.logging.LoggingCommands.

section.title: logging setup
section.para: Configure logging in your project

listitem.para: The log level to configure
The package to append the logging level to (all by default)

section.title: Mail Commands
section.para: Mail Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.email.MailCommands.

section.title: email sender setup
section.para: Install a Spring JavaMailSender in your project

listitem.para: The host server
The protocol used by mail server
The port used by mail server
The encoding used for mail
The mail account username
The mail account password

section.title: email template setup
section.para: Configures a template for a SimpleMailMessage

listitem.para: The 'from' email (optional)
The message subject (obtional)

section.title: field email template
section.para: Inserts a MailTemplate field into an existing type

listitem.para: The name of the field to add
The name of the class to receive this field

section.title: Maven Commands
section.para: Maven Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.maven.MavenCommands.

section.title: dependency add
section.para: Adds a new dependency to the Maven project object model (POM)

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
No help available

section.title: dependency remove
section.para: Removes an existing dependency from the Maven project object model (POM)

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
No help available

section.title: perform clean
section.para: Executes a full clean (including Eclipse files) via Maven
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: perform command
section.para: Executes a user-specified Maven command

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: perform eclipse
section.para: Sets up Eclipse configuration via Maven
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: perform package
section.para: Packages the application using Maven, but does not execute any tests
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: perform tests
section.para: Executes the tests via Maven
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: project
section.para: Creates a new project

listitem.para: The uppermost package name
The name of the project (last segment of package name used as default)
Forces a particular major version of Java to be used (will be auto-detected if unspecified; specify 5 or 6 or 7 only)

section.title: Metadata Commands
section.para: Metadata Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.classpath.MetadataCommands.

section.title: metadata for id
section.para: Shows detailed information about the metadata item

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: metadata for type
section.para: Shows detailed metadata for the indicated type

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: metadata status
section.para: Shows metadata statistics
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: metadata trace
section.para: Traces metadata event delivery notifications (0=none, 1=some, 2=all)

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: Prop File Commands
section.para: Prop File Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.propfiles.PropFileCommands.

section.title: properties list
section.para: Shows the details of a particular properties file

listitem.para: No help available
No help available

section.title: properties remove
section.para: Removes a particular properties file property

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
The property key that should be removed

section.title: properties set
section.para: Changes a particular properties file property

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
The property key that should be changed
The new vale for this property key

section.title: Security Commands
section.para: Security Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.security.SecurityCommands.

section.title: security setup
section.para: Install Spring Security into your project
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: Selenium Commands
section.para: Selenium Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.web.selenium.SeleniumCommands.

section.title: selenium test
section.para: Creates a new Selenium test for a particular controller

listitem.para: No help available
No help available
No help available

section.title: Simple Parser
section.para: Simple Parser are contained in org.springframework.roo.shell.SimpleParser.

section.title: help
section.para: Shows system help

listitem.para: No help available

section.title: reference guide
section.para: Writes the reference guide XML fragments (in DocBook format) into the current working directory
This command does not accept any options.

section.title: Web Flow Commands
section.para: Web Flow Commands are contained in org.springframework.roo.addon.web.flow.WebFlowCommands.

section.title: web flow
section.para: Install Spring Web Flow configuration artifacts into your project

listitem.para: The name for your web flow
